mapper.insert:
insert into artist (artist_id, name, alias, category, initial, pic_url, brief_desc, music_size, album_size, mv_size, create_time, update_time, introduction) values
(#{record.artistId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.initial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.briefDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.musicSize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{record.albumSize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{record.mvSize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
